header.description: Every request to the API requires an x-auth-token in the header for authentication. This token is generated when a user logs in and must be included in each subsequent request to verify the user’s session and permissions.
Requires Internal-access-token to access this api
requires tenantId for which the mapping is done for
requires orgId as this is internal api
mandatory for super admin, optional for tenant admin and org admin
